Title: Establishes certain limits on sports betting for both mobile and casino sports betting
Summary: Establishes certain limits on sports betting for both mobile and casino sports betting to include advertisements, wager limits, and prohibiting the use of credit cards to make deposits on mobile sports betting.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to regulating sports betting and sports betting advertising campaigns
